channel.title: Help me with a little prob

item.title: Help me with a little prob
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

when im buyying xp it is supposed to cost 600mil…and yeah the 600 mil dissapears when i accept but i can also accept without anymoney and it works…little problem…
here is what i added:can you tell me how to change so that you need 600mil to buy?

[code] } else if (NpcDialogue == 4) { //Aubury
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 600000000)) {
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 600000000);
showInterface(2808);
NpcDialogue = 0;
break;
}

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with a little prob
